metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6508 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
CRLF injection vulnerability in the url_parse function in url.c in Wgetthrough 1.19.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers viaCRLF sequences in the host subcomponent of a URL.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6508` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wget - 1.17.1-1ubuntu1.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wget package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.17.1-1ubuntu1.3').
